summary: TL* THE CONTACT OWNS A 2014 HARBOR FREIGHT HAUL MASTER TRAILER. THE CONTACT RECEIVED NOTIFICATION OF NHTSA CAMPAIGN NUMBER: 16V597000 (EXTERIOR LIGHTING); HOWEVER, THE PARTS TO DO THE REPAIR WERE UNAVAILABLE. THE CONTACT STATED THAT THE MANUFACTURER EXCEEDED A REASONABLE AMOUNT OF TIME FOR THE RECALL REPAIR. THE DEALER WAS NOT CONTACTED. THE MANUFACTURER WAS CONTACTED AND INFORMED THE CONTACT THAT THE PARTS WERE NOT AVAILABLE AND WERE ON BACKORDER. THE CONTACT HAD NOT EXPERIENCED A FAILURE. THE VIN WAS NOT AVAILABLE.

TL* THE CONTACT OWNS A 2014 HARBOR FREIGHT HRFR (NA) TRAILER. THE CONTACT RECEIVED NOTIFICATION OF NHTSA CAMPAIGN NUMBER: 17V638000 (TIRES); HOWEVER, THE PART TO DO THE REPAIR WAS UNAVAILABLE. THE CONTACT STATED THAT THE MANUFACTURER EXCEEDED A REASONABLE AMOUNT OF TIME FOR THE RECALL REPAIR. HARBOR FREIGHT TOOLS IN SAINT AUGUSTINE, FLORIDA WAS MADE AWARE OF THE RECALL AND STATED THAT THE PARTS WERE UNAVAILABLE. THE MANUFACTURER WAS MADE AWARE OF THE ISSUE. THE CONTACT HAD NOT EXPERIENCED A FAILURE. PARTS DISTRIBUTION DISCONNECT. *TT      THE CONSUMER STATED THE PROBLEM HAS BEEN RESOLVED. *TR

HARBOR FREIGHT TRAILER EQUIPPED WITH INNOVA ULTRA RUNNER , TIN OFCB, TIRE SIZE: 5.3X12   I RECEIVED NOTIFICATION OF TIRE RECALL HOWEVER, THE PARTS TO DO THE REPAIR ARE STILL UNAVAILABLE OVER 60 DAYS SINCE I RECEIVED THE RECALL NOTIFICATION.. THE RECALL STATES THAT THIS PERIOD OF TIME THE MANUFACTURER EXCEEDED 60 DAYS TO MAKE TIRES AVAILABLE, I HAVE CONTACTED SEVERAL HARBOR FREIGHT STORES AND NONE HAVE THESE TIRES AVAILABLE.
